formatDescription: WebP is a raster image format developed by Google that uses the Resource Interchange File Format as a container. The extended version of the format allows for alternative colour profiles and animation.
provenanceCompoundName: Digital Preservation Department / The National Archives
formatProvenance: 08/2023 (v.113) - Added priority over fmt/1886 (Resource Interchange Format (RIFF)). Submitted by New York Public Libraries and Preservica.11/2023 (v.115)- Added MIME identifier 'webp/image'. Submitted by Archives New Zealand. Submitted by Archives New Zealand. 04/2024 (v.118)- Corrected MIME identifier to 'image/webp'. Submitted by Archives New Zealand.
